item.title: More frozen shrimp recalled for possible radioactive contamination
item.description: More packages of frozen shrimp potentially affected by radioactive contamination have been recalled

item.title: 6 people found dead at Colorado dairy. Authorities suspect an accident involving gas
item.description: Authorities say an apparent accident involving exposure to gas at a dairy in Colorado has killed six people

item.title: Matcha madness leaves Japan's tea ceremony pros skeptical
item.description: Matcha, a finely ground Japanese green tea, is experiencing a boom

item.title: How MLB's upcoming deals will change how you watch out-of-market, Sunday night and Wild Card games

item.title: Musk's X reaches tentative settlement with former Twitter workers in $500M lawsuit
